text: You have two options for setting up your computer: the Linux Mint desktop environment on a MacBook Pro, or a Debian-based Linux installation on a Logic node running macOS. You can choose to go with either option if you prefer a traditional desktop experience or want more control over the system's configuration and software availability.
content:
